text: Going to close this in favor of #297 solution (which seem more robust anyway). =D
This change does not contain tests. I'd vote for closing it in favor of #323, which is technically similar, but much more complete.

Changed scope_to_list() to return empty list.

Possible partial fix for https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/issues/297

Make sure scope is not None 

Instead of the try statement, with the fix I added to util.py, you only need a if/else. Here's another way to fix https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/issues/296 and https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/issues/306

Merge pull request #2 from georgewhewell/lock-requirements
